#### Perfect Fit Guarantee(With Free Refunds)
## We Believe In Custom Clothes
Everyone is different. Tall, short, big and small. That's why we think your clothes should be made just for you. MTailor creates custom clothes measured right on your phone in just 15 seconds. Your perfect fit is just a few clicks away.
![](https://www.mtailor.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=avif,quality=90/https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f5bdf3256186deeef284fa2/5f5f70d1c590645d6090c663_Vector-\(2\).png)

## Frequently Asked Questions
How does this whole "custom" thing work?
You get measured with the camera on your phone in less than 15 seconds through our mobile app. After that, we custom design your unique clothing pattern and individually make your garment. We use over 16 unique measurements to create a perfect fit just for you. Then we ship your order directly to you, typically in under 3 weeks, one of the fastest deliveries in the custom business.
Do I have to purchase before getting measured?
Nope! You can download our app and get measured all for free. We encourage our users to try out the app and get a feel for the technology so they are confident in placing their first order.
Does the technology really work? How can I trust this company?
Before selling to a single customer, we compared our technology to a group of professional tailors. We measured a group of people with those tailors and found our technology to be 20% more accurate than the average tailor. In statistics terms, we found that MTailor's measurement for any given person was 20% closer to the average of all the tailors' measurements than any average individual tailor. That, and more than 100,000 satisfied customers from over 50 countries, is why you can be confident that you'll receive a perfect fit from us!
What happens if my clothes don't fit?
In the rare cases where the fit is not right the first time, we have a comprehensive Remake policy. Just contact our team of friendly and knowledgeable fit experts and we will make adjustments and tailor you a new garment until everything is perfect. You can read all about it on our [Free Remake](http://mtailor.com/</freeremake>) page.
Give the gift of a perfect fit!

## Frequently Asked Questions
How does this whole "custom" thing work?
You get measured with the camera on your phone in less than 15 seconds through our mobile app. After that, we custom design your unique clothing pattern and individually make your garment. We use over 16 unique measurements to create a perfect fit just for you. Then we ship your order directly to you, typically in under 3 weeks, one of the fastest deliveries in the custom business.
Do I have to purchase before getting measured?
Nope! You can download our app and get measured all for free. We encourage our users to try out the app and get a feel for the technology so they are confident in placing their first order.
Does the technology really work? How can I trust this company?
Before selling to a single customer, we compared our technology to a group of professional tailors. We measured a group of people with those tailors and found our technology to be 20% more accurate than the average tailor. In statistics terms, we found that MTailor's measurement for any given person was 20% closer to the average of all the tailors' measurements than any average individual tailor. That, and more than 100,000 satisfied customers from over 50 countries, is why you can be confident that you'll receive a perfect fit from us!
What happens if my clothes don't fit?
In the rare cases where the fit is not right the first time, we have a comprehensive Remake policy. Just contact our team of friendly and knowledgeable fit experts and we will make adjustments and tailor you a new garment until everything is perfect. You can read all about it on our Free Remake⟨83⟩ page.
Give the gift of a perfect fit!

generated_description:
### MTailor: Custom-Fitting Clothing at Your Fingertips

**Overview:**
Founded in 2012 and emerging from Y Combinator’s S14 batch, MTailor is a San Francisco-based company that leverages cutting-edge technology to deliver custom-fit apparel—all from the convenience of your smartphone. Their mission is clear: to get you measured in under 30 seconds for clothing that fits perfectly.

**How It Works:**
Using an app available for iPad and iPhone, MTailor allows users to capture their body measurements with the help of machine-learning algorithms. These algorithms create a personalized garment pattern based on 16 unique measurements, purportedly yielding clothing that is 20% more accurate than a traditional tailor. This process not only offers precision but also shifts the whole measuring experience into an easy, user-friendly app format.

**Product Range:**
MTailor specializes in a variety of men’s and women’s apparel, including:

- **Tops:** Shirts, t-shirts, polos, and more.
- **Suits:** Custom suits, blazers, and dress pants.
- **Bottoms:** Jeans, chinos, shorts, and performance wear.
- The platform even provides options for customizing various design details like collar style, button color, and more.

In addition, they boost customer confidence with features like a **90-day Perfect Fit Guarantee**, including free remakes and refunds.

**Location and Team:**
Located in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco, MTailor operates with a dedicated team of 11 employees, ensuring personalized customer care and garment creation.

**Customer Engagement and Sales:**
MTailor frequently runs promotions, such as discounts during Black Friday and Cyber Monday, to engage new and returning customers. They also offer gift cards for those looking to give the gift of perfect fit, emphasizing their belief that bespoke clothing should be accessible.

**In Summary:**
MTailor is revolutionizing the way individuals shop for clothing. By merging technology with fashion, they provide a seamless experience that allows consumers to enjoy the luxurious feel of custom-made apparel without the traditional hassle of fitting and measuring. So put away that measuring tape and pull out your phone—your perfect fit is just a few clicks away!

For more details, you can visit [MTailor’s website](http://mtailor.com).
